briefTitle: Preoperative Alignment of Total Knee Replacement

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:patients undergoing primary total knee replacement -

Exclusion Criteria:patients who have hardware involving the hip, knee or ankle

\-

outcomeMeasures.title: Surgical Time
outcomeMeasures.description: the difference between the average surgical time will be determined and compared with 95% CI

outcomeMeasures.title: Alignment of Knee - Measured Mechanical Axis From CT Data
outcomeMeasures.description: the mean knee mechanical axis was determined from 3D CT data - negative value designates varus alignment
